reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've just returned from a 5 night break at the Almar. Flights were on time leaving Gatwick and all of the improvements at Faro arrivals have been completed. Wd booked a private transfer through Travel Republic and they failed to tell us or detail it on their documents that you have to join a long queue on the right hand side as you exit arrivals. Anyway, the transfer took longer than normal because they avoided the toll rd.
reviews.title: Return to the Almar

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check in was super quick and the staff very friendly, the only suprise was we were asked for a security deposit. Travel Republic failed to notify us of this and is not detailed in any of their paperwork/emails. To hire a security box costs us 12.50euro for 6 days plus a 25 euro deposit.
reviews.title: Spot On Just The Job

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a 1 bedroom apartment and i asked for a high and quiet room and that's what we got. A big, spacious and clean apartment with sea views frlm the bedroom and balcony. I agree with other reviews that the rooms need updating. The lounge is spacious with 2 sofa's and a 4 seat dining table. The kitchen has everything you need except a kettle. The location is also a winner only 5 minutes walk to the old town.
reviews.title: Hidden Gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: it was my fiance's birthday whilst we were in Albufeira and the hotel suprised us with a card and a bottle of bubbly!!
reviews.title: Great Value- Safe and secure

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Albufeira was not busy but nearly all places were open. It also felt as if the council have amde an effort as tbe streets were cleaner with less dog mess, graffiti and we didn't see one gypsy!!
reviews.title: Great base in Albufeira

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we stayed here because of location to oldtown, apartments have great character, very spacious and amazing sea and old town views.all one bed apartments have either full or side sea views. we had side sea view and it was amazing. approx 7 minutes walk to the escalators which bring you to the beach and oldtown. i would not recommend these apts to families as there are no entertainment facilities or proper bar or snackbar facilities. they are purely for accomadation purposes only, which suited our needs. the reception staff were very friendly. the higher the floor the better the view, four floors in total. only major drawback was no air con.
reviews.title: authentic apartments close to old town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have just returned from a 5 night stay at the Almar with my boyfriend. All in all this was a lovely place to stay, great location (short walk to the Old Town), nice big one bedroom apartment, gorgeous pool/sea view (requested prior to arrival), lovely quiet and refreshing pool area - great for a dip on a hot day! Staff were also very welcoming and accomodating!
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel - but air con would have been nice!
Great value for money
reviews.text: Own only issue with this hotel was that there was no air con OR ceiling fan in any part of the apartment. This meant that it was not particularly pleasant getting ready in the evenings and also after walking in from a beach/pool day already hot, only to be met by a wall of heat in your apartment! Beds also very hard, but this is common in that part of the world, however due to the beds and lack of air we ended up sleeping on the sofa's on the floor of the living room with the balcony doors open! Which was wonderfully breezy in comparison!
Other than this I'd really recommend this hotel, great for couples and families alike - wonderful holiday in Albuferia! :-)
reviews.title: quiet apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here in April 2012. Apartments are a bit dated but in good location and view from balcony is amazing. Hotel was quiet and pool was cold, but it was only April. Kitchen is fine and has enough amenities for a comfortable stay. Would recommend it
reviews.title: Perfect Location

reviews.text: First visit to portugal, Hotel Almar Apt 206 Sea/pool view.Large basic but clean apts. Bathrooms could do with a re-vamp though,These are fab appartments for what you pay.
reviews.title: Great Location. Edwards family South Wales 26/6/2012

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is great ,Old Town less than 10 min walk didnt need a taxi all week [result]
reviews.title: GREAT APARTMENTS

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff very helpfull and friendly. Mc Donalds/ KFC just up the road Little bars/ restaurants just outside. Average prices large beer 2.50 euros glass of wine 2.00 euros
reviews.title: Highly recommend the Almar

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The old town great especially at night, plenty bars/restaurants live music etc.
reviews.title: Excellent Apartments at the Almar - Room 302 3rd floor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Didnt do THE Strip, have finally resigned to the fact im getting too old for that '' ha ha,''
reviews.title: almar great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The positives - The location of this hotel is perfect! It's 10 mins walk to a large supermarket and 5 mins walk to a smaller shop. It's a 10 min walk downhill to the escalators leading to the beach and Old Town where there are plentiful bars and restaurants to suit all tastes and budgets. We booked a sea view room which was beautiful and very spacious throughout! Staff were very helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Perfect location but that was all that was perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The negatives - this hotel is very dated and needs a lot of improvements. The bathroom and kitchen are both very old. The towels left in the bathroom were already dirty. There was basically nothing in the kitchen - no washing up liquid or cleaning products of any kind, no cloth or sponges to clean/wash up with, no kettle, no bin, not even a pair of scissors. The mini oven/grill looked older than my Grandma so we didn't dare touch that. We also noticed that there was no smoke alarms in the whole of the apartment. We thought we would get a double room but it was 2 single beds pushed together and they were rock hard - we slept on the sofa for 2 nights. The floors obviously hadn't been cleaned as there was hair and sand there from before we arrived. The TV was tiny and reception wasn't brilliant. There was also no wi-fi available. There was a computer available in the reception at a cost of 1 euro for 10 mins. We only just managed to book our return transfer before the 10 mins ran out because the computer was so slow.
reviews.title: location could not be bettered

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall this hotel is perfect for groups wanting to get drunk and go to the beach who aren't particularly bothered about cleanliness, not for a relaxing couples holiday.
reviews.title: Perfect for the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked a late deal mid October just to get a bit of sun before winter sets in, First time visit to albufeira. Not knowing resort or area we took a punt of a suprisingly cheap deal we found online and decided to pay a little extra for a 1 bed apartment with sea views - really glad we did. genuinely inpressed with the rooms and the view was perfect. Okay the rooms are very dated and more than a little tired, and the kitchen had only the very basic(and old school appliances) not such a great problem as most people eat out at one of the hundred excellent restaurants and bars in the old town. This is probably the biggest plus for this hotel is the location - Literally a ten minute walk down into the old town. With the brilliant escalators to take you down to beach level.
reviews.title: you get what ya pay for

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool area is well serviced and clean, we were very lucky as our week had an unseaonal heatwave of clear blue skys and 28-29 deg temp - something we hadn't planned or packed for.
reviews.title: Great location to old town....Fab views!
